newsitem.title: USA: Goodrich on target for earnings growth.
newsitem.headline: Goodrich on target for earnings growth.

text.p: BFGoodrich Co Thursday reported firm first quarter earnings from continuing operations, saying the company is on target for another good year of earnings growth.

Net income was sharply higher in the latest quarter, the company said, citing the sale of Tremco Inc which resulted in an after-tax gain of $59.5 million, or $1.09 per share, pushing profits to $85.0 million, or $1.56 a share.
Income from continuing operations was $25.5 million, or $0.47 a share, compared with $24.1 million, or $0.45 a share, a year ago.

Chief executive David L. Burner said: "The company's aerospace and specialty chemicals businesses are experiencing excellent demand and market conditions are generally very good. We are on target to achieve another good year of earnings growth." ((-- New York Newsdesk 212-859-1610.))
